text: Julia is a 1977 American World War II drama movie directed by Fred Zinnemann and based on the 1973 novel Pentimento by Lillian Hellman. It stars Vanessa Redgrave, Jason Robards, Jane Fonda, Hal Holbrook, Rosemary Murphy, Maximilian Schell, Meryl Streep and Lisa Pelikan and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 11 Oscars and won 3 Academy Awards in 1978. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Fred Zinnemann Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1977 war movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:Movies featuring a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award- winning performance Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies set on trains Category:American buddy movies Category:Female buddy movies Category:Buddy drama movies
title: Julia (1977 movie)
